input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product title.

Product title:
SPEEDO Aquablade Recordbreaker - Youth

Product keywords:
100% Polyester
Speedo Girl's Aquablade Recordbreaker Swimsuit
Speedo Girl's Aquablade Recordbreaker Swimsuit:
Go-To Competition Suit You Can Always Count-On for Great Comfort, Fit, & Performance
Stripes Create Channeling Effect to Streamline Water Away from Body
Fabric Offers Lower Drag Co-Efficient & is Slicker than Skin

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Speedo Girl's Aquablade Recordbreaker Swimsuit is a go-to competition suit you can always count-on for great comfort, fit, and performance. The stripes create a channeling effect to streamline water away from the body, and the fabric offers lower drag co-efficient and is slicker than skin. This fully bonded swimsuit is 100% polyester and offers great durability.
input_text.Response B: This is a swimsuit made of polyester fabric. It has stripes that help channel the water away from the body, which makes it more slippery than skin and thus lowers the drag coefficient. This swimsuit is good for competition because it offers great comfort, fit, and performance.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
